org.logl

Interface LoggerProvider

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AdjustableLoggerProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DuplicatingLoggerProvider, JULLoggerProvider, Log4j2LoggerProvider, Slf4jLoggerProvider

    public interface LoggerProvider
    A provider for Logger instances.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default Logger getLogger(java.lang.Class<?> loggingClass)
      Obtain a logger for a given class (by name).
      Logger getLogger(java.lang.String name)
      Obtain a logger for a specified name.
      static java.lang.String loggerName(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
      Utility function for obtaining the logger name for a class.
      static LoggerProvider nullProvider() 

    • Method Detail

      • nullProvider

        static LoggerProvider nullProvider()
        Returns:
        A LoggerProvider that returns Logger instances that discards all log messages.

      • getLogger

        default Logger getLogger(java.lang.Class<?> loggingClass)
        Obtain a logger for a given class (by name).
        Parameters:
        loggingClass - The class to obtain a Logger for.
        Returns:
        A Logger instance for the class (by name).

      • getLogger

        Logger getLogger(java.lang.String name)
        Obtain a logger for a specified name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name to obtain a Logger for.
        Returns:
        A Logger instance for the specified name.

      • loggerName

        static java.lang.String loggerName(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
        Utility function for obtaining the logger name for a class.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class to obtain a logger name for.
        Returns:
        The name of the class.
